import React from 'react' import { Api } from '../API/Api' import { endPoints } from '../API/Endpoint' const ChangePassword = () => { const submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const reqpayload = { confirmPassword: "123456", currentPassword: "654321", newPassword: "123456" } console.log(reqpayload) Api.post(endPoints.UPDATE_USER_DETAIL, reqpayload).then((res) => { console.log(res) }).catch((err) => { console.log(err) }) } return ( <>
